mapper.insert: INSERT INTO orders ( order_number, file_url, notes, opportunity_id, customer_id, total_amount, signed_date, order_status ) VALUES ( #{orderNumber}, #{fileUrl}, #{notes}, #{opportunityId}, #{customerId}, #{totalAmount}, #{signedDate}, #{orderStatus} )
mapper.select: SELECT orders.id as order_id, orders.order_number, orders.total_amount, orders.signed_date, orders.order_status, orders.file_url, orders.notes, orders.create_time, c.name as customer_name, o.name as opportunity_name, os.order_status_name FROM orders LEFT JOIN order_status os ON orders.order_status = os.order_status_id LEFT JOIN customers c ON orders.customer_id = c.id LEFT JOIN opportunities o ON orders.opportunity_id = o.id WHERE orders.order_status = ?
mapper.update: update orders set order_status = #{status} where id = #{id}
